spit_acid.gainMessage: You gain the ability to spit acid.
spit_acid.loseMessage: You lose the ability to spit acid.

br_fire.gainMessage: You gain the ability to breathe fire.
br_fire.loseMessage: You lose the ability to breathe fire.

telekines.gainMessage: You gain the ability to move objects telekinetically.
telekines.loseMessage: You lose the ability to move objects telekinetically.

vteleport.gainMessage: You gain the power of teleportation.
vteleport.loseMessage: You lose the power of teleportation.

mind_blst.description: You can Mind Blast your enemies.
mind_blst.gainMessage: You gain the power of Mind Blast.
mind_blst.loseMessage: You lose the power of Mind Blast.

radiation.description: You can emit hard radiation at will.

vampirism.description: You can drain life from a foe like a vampire.

smell_met.description: You can smell nearby precious metal.
smell_met.loseMessage: You no longer smell a metallic odor.

smell_mon.loseMessage: You no longer smell filthy monsters.

blink.description: You can teleport yourself short distances.
blink.gainMessage: You gain the power of minor teleportation.
blink.loseMessage: You lose the power of minor teleportation.

swap_pos.description: You can switch locations with another being.
swap_pos.gainMessage: You feel like walking a mile in someone else's shoes.
swap_pos.loseMessage: You feel like staying in your own shoes.

shriek.description: You can emit a horrible shriek.
shriek.gainMessage: Your vocal cords get much tougher.
shriek.loseMessage: Your vocal cords get much weaker.

illumine.gainMessage: You can light up rooms with your presence.
illumine.loseMessage: You can no longer light up rooms with your presence.

det_curse.description: You can feel the danger of evil magic.
det_curse.loseMessage: You can no longer feel evil magics.

berserk.description: You can drive yourself into a berserk frenzy.
berserk.loseMessage: You no longer feel a controlled rage.

polymorph.description: You can polymorph yourself at will.

midas_tch.description: You can turn ordinary items to gold.

grow_mold.description: You can cause mold to grow near you.
grow_mold.gainMessage: You feel a sudden affinity for mold.
grow_mold.loseMessage: You feel a sudden dislike for mold.

resist.description: You can harden yourself to the ravages of the elements.
resist.gainMessage: You feel like you can protect yourself.
resist.loseMessage: You feel like you might be vulnerable.

earthquake.description: You can bring down the dungeon around your ears.
earthquake.gainMessage: You gain the ability to wreck the dungeon.
earthquake.loseMessage: You lose the ability to wreck the dungeon.

eat_magic.description: You can consume magic energy for your own use.
eat_magic.loseMessage: Your magic items no longer look delicious.

weigh_mag.description: You can feel the strength of the magics affecting you.
weigh_mag.gainMessage: You feel you can better understand the magic around you.

sterility.gainMessage: You can give everything around you a headache.
sterility.loseMessage: You hear a massed sigh of relief.

panic_hit.description: You can run for your life after hitting something.
panic_hit.gainMessage: You suddenly understand how thieves feel.

dazzle.description: You can emit confusing, blinding radiation.
dazzle.gainMessage: You gain the ability to emit dazzling lights.
dazzle.loseMessage: You lose the ability to emit dazzling lights.

laser_eye.description: Your eyes can fire laser beams.
laser_eye.gainMessage: Your eyes burn for a moment.
laser_eye.loseMessage: Your eyes burn for a moment, then feel soothed.

recall.description: You can travel between the town and the dungeon.
recall.gainMessage: You feel briefly homesick, but it passes.

banish.description: You can send evil creatures directly to Hell.
banish.gainMessage: You feel a holy wrath fill you.
banish.loseMessage: You no longer feel a holy wrath.

cold_touch.description: You can freeze things with a touch.

launcher.description: You can hurl objects with great force.
launcher.gainMessage: Your throwing arm feels much stronger.
launcher.loseMessage: Your throwing arm feels much weaker.

bers_rage.description: You are subject to berserker fits.
bers_rage.gainMessage: You become subject to fits of berserk rage!
bers_rage.loseMessage: You are no longer subject to fits of berserk rage!

cowardice.loseMessage: You are no longer an incredible coward!

hallu.gainMessage: You are afflicted by a hallucinatory insanity!

flatulent.description: You are subject to uncontrollable flatulence.
flatulent.gainMessage: You become subject to uncontrollable flatulence.
flatulent.loseMessage: You are no longer subject to uncontrollable flatulence.

horns.gainMessage: Horns pop out of your forehead!

beak.gainMessage: Your mouth turns into a sharp, powerful beak!
beak.loseMessage: Your beak turns into a mouth.

prod_mana.description: You are producing magical energy uncontrollably.
prod_mana.gainMessage: You start producing magical energy uncontrollably.
prod_mana.loseMessage: You stop producing magical energy uncontrollably.

speed_flux.description: You move faster or slower randomly.

banish_all.description: You sometimes cause nearby creatures to vanish.
banish_all.gainMessage: You feel a terrifying power lurking behind you.
banish_all.loseMessage: You no longer feel a terrifying power lurking behind you.

eat_light.description: You sometimes feed off of the light around you.
eat_light.gainMessage: You feel a strange kinship with Ungoliant.
eat_light.loseMessage: You feel the world's a brighter place.

trunk.gainMessage: Your nose grows into an elephant-like trunk.
trunk.loseMessage: Your trunk shrinks back into a nose.

tentacles.gainMessage: Evil-looking tentacles sprout from your sides.
tentacles.loseMessage: Your tentacles vanish from your sides.

raw_chaos.description: You occasionally are surrounded with raw chaos.
raw_chaos.gainMessage: You feel the universe is less stable around you.
raw_chaos.loseMessage: You feel the universe is more stable around you.

normality.description: You may be mutated, but you're recovering.

wraith.description: You fade in and out of physical reality.
wraith.gainMessage: You start to fade in and out of the physical world.
wraith.loseMessage: You are firmly in the physical world.

poly_wound.description: Your health is subject to chaotic forces.
poly_wound.gainMessage: You feel forces of chaos entering your old scars.
poly_wound.loseMessage: You feel forces of chaos departing your old scars.

wasting.description: You have a horrible wasting disease.
wasting.gainMessage: You suddenly contract a horrible wasting disease.
wasting.loseMessage: You are cured of the horrible wasting disease!

weird_mind.description: Your mind randomly expands and contracts.
weird_mind.gainMessage: Your thoughts suddenly take off in strange directions.
weird_mind.loseMessage: Your thoughts return to boring paths.

nausea.description: You have a seriously upset stomach.
nausea.gainMessage: Your stomach starts to roil nauseously.

chaos_gift.gainMessage: You attract the notice of a chaos deity!
chaos_gift.loseMessage: You lose the attention of the chaos deities.

walk_shad.description: You occasionally stumble into other shadows.
walk_shad.gainMessage: You feel like reality is as thin as paper.
walk_shad.loseMessage: You feel like you're trapped in reality.

warning.description: You receive warnings about your foes.

invuln.gainMessage: You are blessed with fits of invulnerability.
invuln.loseMessage: You are no longer blessed with fits of invulnerability.

sp_to_hp.description: Your blood sometimes rushes to your muscles.
sp_to_hp.gainMessage: You are subject to fits of magical healing.
sp_to_hp.loseMessage: You are no longer subject to fits of magical healing.

hp_to_sp.description: Your blood sometimes rushes to your head.
hp_to_sp.gainMessage: You are subject to fits of painful clarity.
hp_to_sp.loseMessage: You are no longer subject to fits of painful clarity.

disarm.description: You occasionally stumble and drop things.
disarm.gainMessage: Your feet grow to four times their former size.
disarm.loseMessage: Your feet shrink to their former size.

hyper_str.description: You are superhumanly strong (+4 STR, -1 INT, -1 WIS).
hyper_str.gainMessage: You turn into a superhuman he-man!

puny.loseMessage: You no longer feel so weak.

hyper_int.description: Your brain is a living computer (+4 INT, +4 WIS).
hyper_int.gainMessage: Your brain evolves into a living computer!
hyper_int.loseMessage: Your brain is no longer a living computer.

xtra_fat.description: You are extremely fat (+2 CON, -2 speed).
xtra_fat.loseMessage: You benefit from a miracle diet!

albino.gainMessage: You turn into an albino! You feel frail...
albino.loseMessage: You are no longer an albino!

flesh_rot.description: Your flesh is rotting (-2 CON, -1 CHR).

silly_voi.description: Your voice is a silly squeak (-4 CHR).
silly_voi.gainMessage: Your voice turns into a ridiculous squeak!

ill_norm.description: Your appearance is masked with illusion.
ill_norm.gainMessage: You start projecting a reassuring image.
ill_norm.loseMessage: You stop projecting a reassuring image.

xtra_eyes.description: You have an extra pair of eyes (+15 search).
xtra_eyes.gainMessage: You grow an extra pair of eyes!

magic_res.loseMessage: You become susceptible to magic again.

xtra_nois.description: You make a lot of strange noise (-3 stealth).

xtra_legs.description: You have an extra pair of legs (+3 speed, -1 DEX).
xtra_legs.gainMessage: You grow an extra pair of legs!
xtra_legs.loseMessage: Your extra pair of legs disappear.

short_leg.description: Your legs are short stubs (-3 speed, +1 CON).
short_leg.gainMessage: Your legs turn into short stubs!

elec_touc.description: Electricity is running through your veins.

fire_body.description: Your body is enveloped in flames.
fire_body.gainMessage: Your body is enveloped in flames!
fire_body.loseMessage: Your body is no longer enveloped in flames.

wart_skin.description: Your skin is covered with warts (-2 CHR, +5 AC).

scales.description: Your skin has turned into scales (-1 CHR, +10 AC).

iron_skin.description: Your skin is made of steel (-3 DEX, +25 AC).

wings.gainMessage: You grow a pair of wings.

fearless.loseMessage: You begin to feel fear again.

limber.description: Your body is very limber (+3 DEX, -1 STR).
limber.loseMessage: Your body is no longer limber.

bad_luck.description: There is a black aura surrounding you.
bad_luck.gainMessage: There is a malignant black aura surrounding you...
bad_luck.loseMessage: Your black aura swirls and fades.

vuln_elem.description: You are susceptible to damage from the elements.

motion.description: Your movements are precise and forceful (+1 stealth).

good_luck.description: There is a white aura surrounding you.
good_luck.gainMessage: There is a benevolent white aura surrounding you...
good_luck.loseMessage: Your white aura shimmers and fades.
